reviewText: Great Movie Loved the New Actress Jennifer!
Don't waste your time, or money! TERRIBLE!
i enjoyed this movie.  it's not one of the great horror movie but it is one you will enjoy. buy it.

Mother's Day Evil is an unnerving indy horror, subtly laced with a slither of dark humour - much like early John Carpenter (the director; not the Disney travesty). Don't get this film if you are a rabid fan of SAW or any of the Hollyweird commercial franchise horrors. It's not an FX laden gore-fest (there is none) - it's far more than that. The director utterly understands and shrewdly embraces the genre to great effect.
